headline: NVIDIA Ties Physical AI And Weather Models To Growth Debate
summary: NVIDIA (NasdaqGS: NVDA) and Opentrons are working together on physical AI for lab automation, connecting NVIDIA Isaac robotics and Cosmos simulation to real-world experiments. The collaboration aims to standardize how biological experiments are run and allow AI systems to help design and execute lab workflows. NVIDIA also introduced its Earth 2 open weather AI tools, designed to provide faster and more detailed forecasting for weather and climate applications. The Earth 2 software is...
